unnormalised: Hey everyone, any updates on Bumrah's fitness? Heard he pulled something during practice last week, on 20/07/2024. Hope he's ready for the Asia Cup! Also, what about Dhawan? He was seen limping in Delhi yesterday around 17:00 hrs. They need him for the batting lineup, yaar! And any news from the NCA about Hardik's recovery after that shoulder injury on 15/08/2023? Get well soon, boys!
normalised: Hey everyone, any updates on Bumrah's fitness? Heard he pulled something during practice last week, on twentieth july two thousand and twenty four. Hope he's ready for the Asia Cup! Also, what about Dhawan? He was seen limping in Delhi yesterday around five p m. They need him for the batting lineup, yaar! And any news from the N C A about Hardik's recovery after that shoulder injury on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three? Get well soon, boys!
